ToolList.API Description: Summarizes a list of objects. The logic of how to summarize a particular object type is an internal implementation detail.
Returns a list of objects sorted by priority. The logic of what constitutes priority for a given object is an internal implementation detail.

API arguments.Argument Description: A list of objects to be prioritized

ToolList.API Description: Adds the given work items to the sprint

API arguments.Argument Description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.
The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added

ToolList.API Description: Returns the ID of the current sprint
Returns a list of work items that are similar to the given work item

API arguments.Argument Description: The ID of the work item for which you want to ﬁnd similar items

ToolList.API Description: Given a search string, returns the id of a matching object in the system of record. If multiple matches are found, it returns the one where the conﬁdence is highest.

API arguments.Argument Description: The search string, could be for example customer’s name, part name, user name.

ToolList.API Description: Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.

API arguments.Argument Description: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.

ToolList.API Description: Returns the ID of the current user
